title: Bulgaria bus crash: Survivors broke window to flee inferno that killed 46
content:
1. Bulgaria bus crash: Survivors broke window to flee inferno that killed 46  BBC News
  2. WorldView: At least 45 dead in Bulgaria bus crash  CBS News
  3. Bus crashes, catches fire in Bulgaria; at least 45 dead  New York Post
  4. Bulgaria bus crash: Children among at least 46 killed  BBC News
  5. Bus crash in Bulgaria kills at least 45 Macedonian tourists  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ブルガリアのバス事故。生存者は窓を割って脱出し、46人が死亡しました。
保加利亚巴士坠毁。幸存者破窗而出，逃离造成46人死亡的地狱
保加利亞巴士墜毀。倖存者破窗而出，逃離造成46人死亡的地獄
